detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinFinance.sol#232-238):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinFinance.sol#236)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinFinance.sol#298-319):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinFinance.sol#302)

ZinFinance.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinFinance.sol#707-709) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,1000000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals()))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinFinance.sol#708)
